title: While doing video call the other participants are only able to see me qs blurred
content: I was doing video call and the other participants are only able to see me as blurred. i tried with duo, WhatsApp and other social media apps and it's all showing me as blurred. As per the forum most of them are facing the same issue on pixel 3a. All of them are still waiting for the update while the solution providing by the authorities are to reset the phone which is not resolving the issue.
